name: TPSD Top Down Shooter
description:
This mini game is the conclusion of a training to learn blueprint mechanics in unreal engine 5

Have fun scoring as many points as possible with your friends.

Thanks to :

Evans BOHL (Gamedev Teacher)...on Youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/c/GamedevTeacher

Mixamo.com

freesound.org

Ready player me.com

Have fun

Game Rules : 

find ten part of key to open the door and escape from zombies and win this level !!

You can use gamepad or ZQSD and up,left,right,down arrow

Enjoy

-------------------------------------------------------------

trouvez dix parties de clé pour ouvrir la porte et échapper aux zombies et gagner ce niveau !!

Vous pouvez utiliser la manette de jeu ou ZQSD et les flèches haut, gauche, droite et bas

Profitez
